job_desc:
About the job
DevOps Engineer




DevOps is a series of practices and processes that are intended to speed up and automate aspects of the processes of developing, testing and releasing software, allowing for the continuous delivery of software and software updates. Whereas previously software would be developed by developers and then passed onto testers to test and go back and forth between them, devOps practices aim to simplify this by integrating these previously separate teams. DevOps engineers are responsible for facilitating this. The role of a devOps engineer combines aspects of a technical role and an IT operations role. While engineers are likely to be involved with coding, and a knowledge of coding languages and principles is required to find problems and build solutions, this is not the primary role of a devOps engineer. More senior engineers are likely to be more involved in the project management and planning side of development.




Responsibilities




Provide Operational Support for applications by adhering knowledge on DevOps standards [CI/CD process] hosted in Private Cloud and Docker container platform.
Building and setting up new development tools and infrastructure
Understanding the needs of stakeholders and conveying this to developers
Working on ways to automate and improve development and release processes
Testing and examining code written by others and analyzing results
Ensuring that systems are safe and secure against cybersecurity threats
Identifying technical problems and developing software updates and ‘fixes’
Working with software developers and software engineers to ensure that development follows established processes and works as intended
Planning out projects and being involved in project management decisions.




Job Requirements /Key Responsibilities




Manage the cloud infrastructure environment through cross technology administration (OS, databases, virtual networks), execution of scripting and monitoring automations.
Manage the environment incidents with a focus on service restoration.
Act as operations support for all computer, network, storage, security, or automation incidents /requests.
Must Have Skills : DevOps
Responsible for delivery of DevOps and cloud platform services in Agile following best practices of SAFE, SCRUM




Technical Experience




Hands on knowledge on public cloud (AWS/ Azure) for all compute, storage and networking services
Hands on experience on DevOps platform roadmap design, DevOps methodologies implementation, DevOps platform Architecture and design
Hands on knowledge on few of the tools like Jenkins and/or Azure Devops, Jira, Kubernetes and/or Terraform, Shell scripting, Bash scripting




Professional Attributes




Good communication skills
Ability to work with multiple stake holders onshore and offshore
Plan and execute tasks as per agreed timelines and budget
Team player ability to work independently




Location Bangalore, India




ABOUT US: OUR WORKPLACE IS FUN AND FAST-PACED:




We are Cervello. We believe in the power of connected data. We are laser focused on helping organizations harness the interconnectedness of digital, data and decision-making. We are problem solvers and builders focused on helping our clients win with data. Our culture is cool and innovative. Our environment is casual and conducive to collaboration and problem solving. We take our work seriously but not ourselves. It’s the perfect balance of freedom and accountability. If you want to be part of something great – join us!




Equal Employment Opportunity and Nondiscrimination




Cervello prides itself on providing a culture that allows employees to bring their best selves to work every day. Our people can feel comfortable, confident, and joyful to do great things for our firm, our teams, and our clients. Cervello aims to build diverse capabilities to help our clients solve their most mission critical problems. Cervello is committed to building a diverse, unbiased and inclusive workforce. Cervello is an equal opportunity employer; we recruit, hire, train, promote, develop, and provide other conditions of employment without regard to a person’s gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, race, religion, age, national origin, disability, marital status, pregnancy status, veteran status, genetic information or any other differences consistent with applicable laws. This includes providing reasonable accommodation for disabilities, or religious beliefs and practices. Members of communities historically underrepresented in analytics and consulting are encouraged to apply.




CERVELLO I Version 06.15.2021

job_desc:
About the job

Job Posting Title: Technology Specialist (Devops)




Posting Location: Bangalore

We're Australia’s leading telecommunications and technology company. And, with a presence in more than 20 countries, we’re creating a global footprint – which for you, that means incredible work opportunities and experiences to develop and grow your career.




Our Global Business Services team

With our world-class network covering the Australian population and connecting businesses internationally, you’ll have exposure to exciting innovations in the IT industry, including cloud computing, IoT, and virtualisation.

As technologies advance, so will your career which means an agile approach will be critical to your success.




The role with us

As a Technology Specialist you will have a critical role in the development and enhancement of a coherent and effective set of solutions and applications within your domain focus area that deliver a great customer experience. You also lead the development of a longer-term cloud-based architecture roadmaps and business solutions in collaboration with cross functional stakeholders that deliver technical and commercial competitive advantage.




Your responsibilities will include:




Develop and maintain technology solutions to facilitate the development of logical data models and its implementation in various data platforms.

Be responsible for implementation and coordination of logical data governance, architecture, quality, and certification to ensure data is discoverable, understandable and trusted.

Ability to instil confidence in the business and demonstrate the business value of data and digitisation.

Excellent analytical, strategic conceptual thinking, strategic planning, and execution skills.

In-depth understanding of current and emerging technologies such as artificial intelligence, and machine learning and how the industry are utilising them.

Continuously identify opportunities to improve the quality of platform data and its management.

Identify efficiencies to improve our data modelling and management

Manage your own workload of deliverables and communications

Contribute to the Data and technology architecture across all products, technologies and services.







To be successful in this role, you should have:

At least 5+ years of experience in the following:

Programming language, database skills and support experience relevant to Web Based and Client Server Applications eg -
Oracle Database (Oracle 12G and Oracle APEX), Jboss EAP, Ngnix, Java, Html, Oracle Rest Services/API’s, PL/SQL, Linux
Use of supporting and analysis tools such as SQL Developer, JDeveloper, Microsoft Access

Deep understanding and experience of Enterprise modern data architecture patterns and processes

A proven track record in delivering data-oriented solutions utilising big data, data warehousing, operational insight, data management or business intelligence.

Strong knowledge of procurement and supply chain systems & business.

Design and develop large data lake and data warehouses across multiple domains

Knowledge of Design Thinking, Agile and DevOps methods.

Demonstrated ability to solution data and analytics frameworks, products and services across Microsoft Azure, Snowflake, Azure Data Factory and Power BI

Proficiency in languages, especially in R, Python, Ruby, Perl, Java, C/C++

Containerisation technology skills: Docker, Kubernetes, Openshift, Kubeflow

Automation skills: Ansible




You will be accountable for:




· Validating requirements, designing solutions, providing various options for the solution, assisting develop the costing of the delivery, working with the Developers to ensure details are aligned and managing the process until the delivery of the solutions.

· Ensuring the detailed designs are aligned with architectural practices and strategic intent.

· Developing a robust security roadmap and implementing controls.

· Contributing and developing roadmaps for the capability area and developing the roadmap around Mobility billing.

· Developing end to end solution lifecycle of the design.




To be successful in the role, you will possess:




· Experience in managing multiple stakeholders including other technology focussed team members.

· Experience working in an Agile environment.

· Proven experience in utilising various applications such as R-IMS, Vector, L-OMS, UPOS, TMS, DataCore.

Why join us?

Here, you can expect to be working at the forefront of our telecommunications technology landscape, on projects key to our success, delivering innovative solutions on a scale you won’t find elsewhere.

Interested?

If you're excited about the opportunity to be part of a team, committed to delivering amazing experiences to our customers – this could be the role for you!




___________________________




We’re committed to building a diverse and inclusive workforce in all its forms. We encourage applicants from diverse gender, cultural and linguistic backgrounds and applicants who may be living with a disability. We also offer flexibility in all our roles, to ensure everyone can participate.




To learn more about how we support our people, including accessibility adjustments we can provide you through the recruitment process, visit tel.st/thrive.




Kindly reach me @ Dhanabal.n@team.telstra.com/9629057916 to discuss further.

job_desc:
About the job

Job Posting Title: Technology Specialist (Devops)




Posting Location: Bangalore

We're Australia’s leading telecommunications and technology company. And, with a presence in more than 20 countries, we’re creating a global footprint – which for you, that means incredible work opportunities and experiences to develop and grow your career.




Our Global Business Services team

With our world-class network covering the Australian population and connecting businesses internationally, you’ll have exposure to exciting innovations in the IT industry, including cloud computing, IoT, and virtualisation.

As technologies advance, so will your career which means an agile approach will be critical to your success.




The role with us

As a Technology Specialist you will have a critical role in the development and enhancement of a coherent and effective set of solutions and applications within your domain focus area that deliver a great customer experience. You also lead the development of a longer-term cloud-based architecture roadmaps and business solutions in collaboration with cross functional stakeholders that deliver technical and commercial competitive advantage.




Your responsibilities will include:




Develop and maintain technology solutions to facilitate the development of logical data models and its implementation in various data platforms.

Be responsible for implementation and coordination of logical data governance, architecture, quality, and certification to ensure data is discoverable, understandable and trusted.

Ability to instil confidence in the business and demonstrate the business value of data and digitisation.

Excellent analytical, strategic conceptual thinking, strategic planning, and execution skills.

In-depth understanding of current and emerging technologies such as artificial intelligence, and machine learning and how the industry are utilising them.

Continuously identify opportunities to improve the quality of platform data and its management.

Identify efficiencies to improve our data modelling and management

Manage your own workload of deliverables and communications

Contribute to the Data and technology architecture across all products, technologies and services.







To be successful in this role, you should have:

At least 5+ years of experience in the following:

Programming language, database skills and support experience relevant to Web Based and Client Server Applications eg -
Oracle Database (Oracle 12G and Oracle APEX), Jboss EAP, Ngnix, Java, Html, Oracle Rest Services/API’s, PL/SQL, Linux
Use of supporting and analysis tools such as SQL Developer, JDeveloper, Microsoft Access

Deep understanding and experience of Enterprise modern data architecture patterns and processes

A proven track record in delivering data-oriented solutions utilising big data, data warehousing, operational insight, data management or business intelligence.

Strong knowledge of procurement and supply chain systems & business.

Design and develop large data lake and data warehouses across multiple domains

Knowledge of Design Thinking, Agile and DevOps methods.

Demonstrated ability to solution data and analytics frameworks, products and services across Microsoft Azure, Snowflake, Azure Data Factory and Power BI

Proficiency in languages, especially in R, Python, Ruby, Perl, Java, C/C++

Containerisation technology skills: Docker, Kubernetes, Openshift, Kubeflow

Automation skills: Ansible




You will be accountable for:




· Validating requirements, designing solutions, providing various options for the solution, assisting develop the costing of the delivery, working with the Developers to ensure details are aligned and managing the process until the delivery of the solutions.

· Ensuring the detailed designs are aligned with architectural practices and strategic intent.

· Developing a robust security roadmap and implementing controls.

· Contributing and developing roadmaps for the capability area and developing the roadmap around Mobility billing.

· Developing end to end solution lifecycle of the design.




To be successful in the role, you will possess:




· Experience in managing multiple stakeholders including other technology focussed team members.

· Experience working in an Agile environment.

· Proven experience in utilising various applications such as R-IMS, Vector, L-OMS, UPOS, TMS, DataCore.

Why join us?

Here, you can expect to be working at the forefront of our telecommunications technology landscape, on projects key to our success, delivering innovative solutions on a scale you won’t find elsewhere.

Interested?

If you're excited about the opportunity to be part of a team, committed to delivering amazing experiences to our customers – this could be the role for you!




___________________________




We’re committed to building a diverse and inclusive workforce in all its forms. We encourage applicants from diverse gender, cultural and linguistic backgrounds and applicants who may be living with a disability. We also offer flexibility in all our roles, to ensure everyone can participate.




To learn more about how we support our people, including accessibility adjustments we can provide you through the recruitment process, visit tel.st/thrive.




Kindly reach me @ Dhanabal.n@team.telstra.com/9629057916 to discuss further.

job_desc:
About the job
Job Req ID:




557




Posting Date:




18-Feb-2023




Function:




Software Engineering




Location:




25A DLF City Phase-III,, Gurugram, India




Salary:




Competitive




We’ve always been an organisation with purpose; to use the power of communications to make a better world. You can trace this back to our beginning as pioneers of the world’s first telecommunications company. At our heart we’re a technology company with research and innovation in our bones and a desire to be personal, simple, and brilliant for our customers - those are the values we live by whilst also creating an inclusive working environment where people from all backgrounds can succeed.




Our pursuit of progress over the past 180 years has established BT as a strong, successful brand, with huge scale capable of achieving great things. From supporting emergency services, hospitals, banks and keeping economies around the world online, safe and secure, to delivering large scale technology infrastructure like the creation of BT Sport.




Today in this fast changing, always on, digital world our purpose remains true. Yet the market conditions, regulation and competition we face are tougher than ever before. So if you have the drive, optimism and resilience to help propel us forward we’ll offer unrivalled personal development, a wealth of opportunities to learn, experience new things and pursue new careers. If that’s you and what you’re looking for, we’d love you to be part of our future.




Key Responsibilities




Proactively monitors, maintains and troubleshoots the ThreatCo and XSOAR platform.
Deploy code in Dev/Test/Pre-Prod/Prod environments using defined CI/CD pipelines.
Manage Change on the platform as per BT change management process.
Continuously develop and enhance proactive monitoring of the platform to deliver 100% uptime.
Responsible for maintaining 100% uptime of the platform and the application.
Work with 3rd party vendor like PANW (Palo Alto Networks) to track and work on support cases.
Work with ThreatCo Engineering, Design and Development team to collaborate and fix issues that require changes to the design of the platform and application.
Setup war room to tackle SHOWSTOPPER or business critical problems.
Open to work within 24x7 support environment (including on-call support)
Work with BT Design and Engineering teams to continuously develop and enhance the platform to deliver SOAR (Security Orchestration, Automation and Response) for BT’s customers.
Escalate issues effectively with vendors and partners.
Keep BT Senior Manager informed during Major Incidents. Lead remediation of Major Incidents impacting ThreatCo XSOAR platform.
Take part in Post Incident Reviews and follow through on implementation of any actions required to ensure lessons are learnt and acted upon.
Vulnerability management for the ThreatCo XSOAR platform – upgrading and patching all systems and components regularly, maintaining the best possible security posture for the platform.




Skills
Strong hands-on experience on Palo Alto XSOAR Application and other Palo products like XSIAM, PA Autofocus, Xpanse, Cortex XDR (Data Lake/snowflake)
Expert in Linux system administration
Experience of running Docker
Experience of using Ansible
AWS Certifications (at least some, not all):
AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Associate
AWS Certified Developer - Associate
AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Professional
AWS Certified DevOps Engineer – Professional
AWS Certified Security - Specialty
Terraform (IaC)
GitHub
Programming experience in a high-level language such as Python, PowerShell, JavaScript, NodeJS, Ruby, Chef, Puppet, YAML, JSON
IP networking
Experience working in Cyber Security
SOAR
SIEM
Threat Intelligence
Next Generation Firewalls
Cloud Proxy
Experience with EndPoint security software is a plus (Antivirus, DLP, IPS, NAC)
ITIL (IT Infrastructure Library) processes
Understanding of IT system monitoring tools and solutions
Self learning, self managing, highly driven to deliver for our customers
Prioritisation of workstack to deliver efficiently and effectively to challenging timescales




Experience




5+ years of experience working in a medium to large organisation supporting complex systems, liaising with vendors and developing an in-depth working knowledge of the same




Experience working in DevOps and Operational Support and experience of the incident management process (ITIL – IT Infrastructure Library)




Proven team player seeking to enhance knowledge of entire team by sharing learning through documentation and delivery of training where required.




MANDATORY:




Certification: Mandatory Certified on AWS Solution Architect Associate
Experienced Linux System Administrator




DESIRABLE:




Experience working in implementation or support role in Cyber Security (Next Generation Firewalls, SIEM, IDS/IPS, vulnerability management, SASE etc.)
skills: ['Amazon Web Services (AWS)', 'JSON', 'Linux System Administration', 'Powershell', 'Proactive Monitoring', 'Puppet (Software)', 'System Monitoring', 'Training Delivery', 'Uptime', 'YAML']

job_desc:
About the job
Primary skills:Automation testing,Functional testing,Cypress,JavaScript,Azure DevOps,

A day in the life of an Infoscion

As part of the Infosys testing team, your primary role would be to Develop test plan, prepare effort estimation and schedule for project execution.
You will prepare test cases, review test case result and anchor defects prevention activities and interface with customers for issue resolution
You will ensure effective test execution by reviewing knowledge management activities and adhere to the organizational guidelines and processes .
Additionally, you will anchor testing requirements, develop test strategy, track, monitor project plans and prepare solution delivery of projects along with reviewing of test plans, test cases and test scripts
You will develop project quality plans, validate defective prevention plans If you think you fit right in to help our clients navigate their next in their digital transformation journey, this is the place for you! A day in the life of an Infoscion
As part of the Infosys testing team, your primary role would be to anchor testing requirements, develop test strategy, track & monitor project plans, review test plans, test cases and test scripts.
You will develop project quality plans, validate defective prevention plans to deliver effective testing solutions for clients.
You will ensure right test environment is available and provide necessary review feedback for test data setup to ensure timely commencement of test execution
You will validate "go live" activities such as production verification to ensure that the application runs in the production environment without any issues.
In addition, you will mentor the team and provide regular feedback and coaching to help them continually improve their performance If you think you fit right in to help our clients navigate their next in their digital transformation journey, this is the place for you!
Possess end-to-end knowledge and experience in testing
Extensive experience in test planning/ test strategy, test estimates
Excellent communication and client handling skills
Experience in one or more scripting languages and automation tools
Analytical, Client interfacing and stakeholder management skills
Knowledge of SDLC and agile methodologies
Project and Team Management Preferred Skills: o Ability to implement in CI-CD pipelines using GIT. o Familiarity to drive/participate in Agile.

job_desc:
About the job

Azure DevOps

The ideal candidate should be playing an Architect role lesioning with client and hexaware. He should possess the following skills:




Technical Skills (Primary):

Should have experience in creating and configuring Azure DevOps projects.
Should be able to create automation using IAAC (Infra as a Code) in Azure DevOps.
Should have good experience in Templates, creating parameters using IAAC.
Should have experience in Automating any Azure Cloud Services like Azure DevOps.
Must have experience CICD pipelines in Azure DevOps.
Should create high level (HLD) and low level (LLD) diagrams for end-to-end DevOps process.
Should have experience in using Octopus Deploy.
Should have experience in Powershell or ARM Template
Should have experience in Yaml Scripting.




Technical Skills (Secondary):

1. Automation experience / knowledge – Jenkins, Groovy, Python, Go, Azure Pipelines, Docker, Kubernetes, SonarQube, Veracode, Checkmarx, Terraform, CFT, ARM Templates etc.,




Functional Skills:

Should be able to design roles with the team to run the projects.
Should be able to optimize the hours spent on tasks.
Should be able to drive the team for every sprints.
Should have experience in creating product backlogs.
Must engage the customer and create and present the solution.
Should be on top of date and provide updated to end clients regularly.
Good Communication Skill.

job_desc:
About the job
Job Description

Role Proficiency:

Able to manage multiple SDLC/PDLC programs from a DevOps architectural perspective by streamlining DevOps practices and translating them into reference architecture for DevOps (CI/CD) and automation components.

Outcomes

Deliver technically sound projects across one / multiple customers within the guidelines of the customer and UST standards and norms
Deliver technically complex DevSecOps solutions
Define architecture for large engagements and act as its design authority
Design solutions involving multiple tech components using DevOps techstack after scoping client requirements for large engagements
Devise a mechanism by assessing system architecture and implementing DevOps roadmap
Identify and institutionalize DevOps best practices across multiple accounts and manage multiple customers and architects
Guide and review technical delivery by internal teams at the program level
Understand the existing customer landscape; assess DevOps maturity level and come up with a roadmap
Provide support to various Project Managers to identify training needs of the team
Conduct training / certifications with the help of Gama and mentoring with respect to technical skills on projects
Support technical evaluation of external and internal candidates to meet project requirements
Perform career guidance and performance management for team members
Develop collaterals for proposals
Conduct workshops at the client site to assist the sales team in sales support as required
Compare various designs and propose appropriate technology solutions based on the understanding of the RFP and input from Architects
Review estimations and resource plan
Review risk and mitigation plan
Anchor proposal development with cross-linkages across multiple competency to arrive at a coherent solution unique value propositions and clear differentiators
Participate in client presentation and client visits

Measures Of Outcomes

Business Development (# of proposals contributed to; # new leads generated)
Stakeholder Satisfaction Survey Results
# of design patterns / components reused / created
Feedback from team
Quality of Service measures
# of technical complex solutions delivered
# of consulting assignments led/participated
# of technology training conducted
Technology certifications
# of white papers / document assets
Breadth of technology knowledge (no. of technologies)
# of reviews and audits

Outputs Expected

Project Control and Review:

Perform architecture design review
Identify oppo

job_desc:
About the job
At EY, you’ll have the chance to build a career as unique as you are, with the global scale, support, inclusive culture and technology to become the best version of you. And we’re counting on your unique voice and perspective to help EY become even better, too. Join us and build an exceptional experience for yourself, and a better working world for all.




Description




MSD_F&O Technical_Staff




The opportunity




GDS which has presence in seven countries with 40,000+ Headcount, is rapidly growing. GDS operations is partnering with business in this journey of growth. Amidst growth, there is need to keep evolving for the management and integration of GDS Operations team.




The role plays a key part in developing customizations in D365FO, handling issues in development and communicating status to key stake holders.




Your Key Responsibilities




Should be able to design, customize and develop customer specific customization requirements.
Should be able to create TDD and develop Unit Test cases.
Should have good experience in D365 F&O Extensions.
Should be able to use LCS and work with Azure Devops.
Should be able to develop/debug customizations in Microsoft D365 F&O.
Should be able to develop SSRS Reports.
Should be able to develop Data entities.
Should be able to work in Integration.
Should be able to Debug complex issues.
Should demonstrate good knowledge in D365 modules.




Skills And Attributes For Success




Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Excellent presentation and consultancy skills
Good Problem-solving techniques
Good knowledge in integration with external legacy systems
Knowledge of Lifecycle Services and Visual Studio Team Services
Good command over X++, C#, and MVC patterns
Knowledge of end-to-end D365FO implementation
Experience in other technologies such as SQL, .NET, and PowerBI is added advantage.
Basic Knowledge in PowerApps/ Logic Apps /Common Data Service, or other Azure Services.
Confident and Willingness to Learn.




Responsibilities, Qualifications, Certifications - External




To qualify for the role, you must have




Overall experience of 4 to 6 years
Experience of working in Operations environment in large multi-national organizations
Should have good understanding of environment and release management
Experience with successful implementations
Should have good understanding in migrations in D365 and older versions of AX




Ideally, you’ll also have




Ability to function in a rapidly changing, heavily matrixed and often virtual environment
Ability to prioritize, drive and adapt to change quickly in a fast-paced environment
Culturally sensitivity and be capable of handling interactions with a “global mindset”




What We Look For




Excellent communicative to work with internal and external resources
Hands-on, committed, team player with a clear emphasis being able to work independently, driven and enthusiastic.
Ability to organize, prioritize estimate and deliver tasks meeting deadlines
Confidence and willingness to learn




What We Offer




EY Global Delivery Services (GDS) is a dynamic and truly global delivery network. We work across six locations – Argentina, China, India, the Philippines, Poland and the UK – and with teams from all EY service lines, geographies and sectors, playing a vital role in the delivery of the EY growth strategy. From accountants to coders to advisory consultants, we offer a wide variety of fulfilling career opportunities that span all business disciplines. In GDS, you will collaborate with EY teams on exciting projects and work with well-known brands from across the globe. We’ll introduce you to an ever-expanding ecosystem of people, learning, skills and insights that will stay with you throughout your career.




Continuous learning: You’ll develop the mindset and skills to navigate whatever comes next.
Success as defined by you: We’ll provide the tools and flexibility, so you can make a meaningful impact, your way.
Transformative leadership: We’ll give you the insights, coaching and confidence to be the leader the world needs.
Diverse and inclusive culture: You’ll be embraced for who you are and empowered to use your voice to help others find theirs.




EY | Building a better working world




EY exists to build a better working world, helping to create long-term value for clients, people and society and build trust in the capital markets.




Enabled by data and technology, diverse EY teams in over 150 countries provide trust through assurance and help clients grow, transform and operate.




Working across assurance, consulting, law, strategy, tax and transactions, EY teams ask better questions to find new answers for the complex issues facing our world today.

job_desc:
About the job
About Accenture: Accenture is a leading global professional services company, providing a broad range of services in strategy and consulting, interactive, technology and operations, with digital capabilities across all of these services. We combine unmatched experience and specialized capabilities across more than 40 industries — powered by the world’s largest network of Advanced Technology and Intelligent Operations centers. With 514,000 people serving clients in more than 120 countries, Accenture brings continuous innovation to help clients improve their performance and create lasting value across their enterprises. Visit us at www.accenture.com


Project Role :Tech Delivery Subject Matter Expert


Project Role Description : Drive innovative practices into delivery, bring depth of expertise to a delivery engagement. Sought out as experts, enhance Accentures marketplace reputation. Bring emerging ideas to life by shaping Accenture and client strategy. Use deep technical expertise, business acumen and fluid communication skills, work directly with a client in a trusted advisor relationship to gather requirements to analyze, design and/or implement technology best practice business changes.


Management Level :10


Work Experience :4-6 years


Work location :Bengaluru


Must Have Skills : Oracle Argus


Good To Have Skills : Life Sciences


Job Requirements :


Key Responsibilities : A: Support and Resolve issues associated with Oracle Argus Safety suite and associated interfaces B: Develop and Implement changes to Argus / Custom Code as per business need C: As Oracle Argus SME, support technical issues and support on time case processing and expedited reporting D: Contribute to design, build and configure activities


Technical Experience : A: Overall IT experience at least 4 years, with a minimum of 2 to 3 years in performing migration or implementation and maintenance/support of Oracle Argus B: Prior experience in leading at least one implementation / upgrade project involving configuration / validation / data migration C: Experience in Regulatory Standards like 21 CFR Part 11, ICH, GxP D: Strong experience in SQL, PL/SQL


Professional Attributes: a Prior work experience in at least one Argus Implementation/Upgrade/Maintenance project b: Good communication skill and contribute to design, implementation of Argus and resolving technical issues c: Knowledge of AGILE methodology


Educational Qualification: a: BE/BTECH in any discipline or Masters in Computer Applications MCA


Additional Information: a: Shift timing Readiness to work in UK business hrs

15 years of full time education
skills: ['Data Migration', 'Helping Clients', 'ICH', 'Methodology', 'Operations', 'PL/SQL']

job_desc:
About the job
Our people work differently depending on their jobs and needs. From hybrid working to flexible hours , we have plenty of options that help our people to thrive.




This role is based in India and as such all normal working days must be carried out in India.




Join us as a Production Support Analyst





This is an opportunity to make a real impact and be pivotal in the success of our business, while benefiting from great variety and stakeholder exposure
We’ll look to you to deliver a complex and critical production management, infrastructure and application support service for relevant platforms, activities and processes across the domain
Hone your existing analytical skills and advance your career in this exciting, fast paced role
This role is available at associate level


What you'll do




As a Production Support Analyst, you’ll support with providing day-to-day technology based services and will assist with deploying new, complex applications and architecture across the domain. We’ll look to you to support the delivery of application management, application support and the building of environments for systems, making sure all deployments into production environments meet the appropriate quality standards.




It’s a highly collaborative role which will see you working closely with platform and domain stakeholders to ensure the robustness and resilience of the platform. You’ll also work with feature teams to understand the upcoming changes and prevent potential issues occurring.




Your role will also involve:





Collaborating with product development and feature teams to understand the upcoming product, enabling continuous integration and continuous deployment to occur
Regularly attending the feature teams’ refinement and planning sessions
Identifying areas for service improvement by analysing and diagnosing re-occurring platform and service incidents, as well as customer and stakeholder feedback
Building a culture of continuous improvement to reinforce the robustness of the domain, with a focus on automation, scalability, continuous integration and continuous delivery


The skills you'll need




We’re looking for someone with technical knowledge and experience including platform, technology, products and domains. Along with this, you’ll bring experience of working in an Agile or DevOps environment with continuous delivery and continuous integration. ITIL knowledge would be useful.




We’re also looking for:





Knowledge and experience of industry standard toolsets and processes
SQL and PL/SQL skills along with IntelliSuite product knowledge
Knowledge and experience of using operational principles
A very capable communicator with the ability to communicate complex technical concepts clearly to your peers and management level colleagues
Good collaboration and stakeholder management skills






Apply for this job
skills: ['Analytical Skills', 'Communication', 'Continuous Integration', 'Application Support', 'English', 'PL/SQL', 'Product Knowledge', 'Production Support', 'System Performance', 'Tech-savvy']

job_desc:
About the job
Requisition ID: 272314




Work Area: Customer Service and Support




Expected Travel: 0 - 10%




Career Status: Professional




Employment Type: Regular Full Time




Company Description




SAP started in 1972 as a team of five colleagues with a desire to do something new. Together, they changed enterprise software and reinvented how business was done. Today, as a market leader in enterprise application software, we remain true to our roots. That’s why we engineer solutions to fuel innovation, foster equality and spread opportunity for our employees and customers across borders and cultures.




SAP values the entrepreneurial spirit, fostering creativity and building lasting relationships with our employees. We know that a diverse and inclusive workforce keeps us competitive and provides opportunities for all. We believe that together we can transform industries, grow economics, lift up societies and sustain our environment. Because it’s the best-run businesses that make the world run better and improve people’s lives.




What You'll Do




The following tasks await you in your new role:




Application of the FI/CO/FSCM Functional or Techno-functional expertise for the digital transformation of our customers according to S/4HANA / Intelligent Enterprise
Design Customer Processes, Configuration of the system and Identification of gaps; designing custom processes
Delivery of premium engagement remote and onsite assessment and expert services
Safeguard & Support customer teams in delivering critical projects
Helping customers with complex root cause analysis and problem resolution.
High willingness to learn in the areas of new innovations and should keep abreast of relevant new SAP features / releases.
Willingness to travel on short notice (primarily within India and SE Asia) for varying durations.




What You Bring




Mandatory: At least 4 years of SAP support or Consulting in the role Financials (FI/CO/FSCM) functional
Experience between 4 and 12 years is desirable
Experienced in Financials process related development is desired along with strong interest to explore Financials IT solutions
Proven record in understanding application and business requirements and delivering results to stakeholders’ satisfaction
Self-Driven in understanding new topics, commitment in execution of assigned tasks
A graduation in financials as major is preferred
Strong interest to learn financials from business and IT application areas
Exposure to ERP and S4HANA products.
Good communication ability in English.
Good collaboration skills with internal and external stakeholders




Know your team




SAP’s key customers continuously extend and adapt their IT infrastructure and processes, to better serve evolving business needs while reducing cost and risk at the same time. SAP’s Adoption Services Center organization enables SAP’s customers to consume SAP’s recent innovations centered on a future-proof “digital core” SAP S/4HANA and modern next-generation cloud solutions as well as the SAP HANA Platform, and to effectively manage the transition from today’s IT architecture.




The core task of the “Premium Hub - Center of Expertise” is to support customers with premium engagement contracts through targeted service delivery and projects. Our experts support customers in the planning and design phase, analyze and solve critical problems and offer reliable quality assurance of the results and the action plan created. The provision of specialist expertise as part of escalations rounds off our core areas of responsibility.




#SAPInternalT3




Working in a hybrid environment includes working from home up two days a week.




What You Get From Us




Success is what you make it. At SAP, we help you make it your own. A career at SAP can open many doors for you. If you’re searching for a company that’s dedicated to your ideas and individual growth, recognizes you for your unique contributions, fills you with a strong sense of purpose, and provides a fun, flexible and inclusive work environment – apply now.




SAP'S DIVERSITY COMMITMENT




To harness the power of innovation, SAP invests in the development of its diverse employees. We aspire to leverage the qualities and appreciate the unique competencies that each person brings to the company.




SAP is committed to the principles of Equal Employment Opportunity and to providing reasonable accommodations to applicants with physical and/or mental disabilities. If you are in need of accommodation or special assistance to navigate our website or to complete your application, please send an e-mail with your request to Recruiting Operations Team (Americas: Careers.NorthAmerica@sap.com or Careers.LatinAmerica@sap.com, APJ: Careers.APJ@sap.com, EMEA: Careers@sap.com).




Successful candidates might be required to undergo a background verification with an external vendor.




Additional Locations:

job_desc:
About the job

JOB DESCRIPTION




Title: Oracle Specialist I




Location: India




The Oracle Specialist is responsible for working and collaborating with Mouser’s Oracle Team (onshore / offshore) in Information Services. The team is responsible for supporting and implementing new functionality within our Oracle HCM and ERP modules. The team focuses on delivering solid (internal) customer service while providing comprehensive solutions to support our Finance and HR teams. The Oracle Specialist I will establish relationships and work with other Oracle team members, Mouser’s Directors, Executives and Business Managers to ensure value-added requirements are met in a timely manner




ACCOUNTABILITIES & ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS




The Oracle Specialist should have general knowledge of latest technologies stack, that range from the traditional architectures to micro services and cloud enabled architectures.
Participate in the development and design sessions of latest Oracle ERP and HCM cloud solutions optimization related to information technology operations, business processes, security, and data integrity for the applications.
Assist in the execution of the day-to-day activities of Oracle Cloud Technical engagements for assigned work related supporting internal customers.
Assist in identifying and managing new Oracle release changes as well as collaborate with other team members to make recommendations based on the needs of the organization.
Be open to identifying competitive services, opportunities for innovation, and provide an assessment of obstacles and technical hurdles to the success of the project.
Be open to coaching and feedback as a prerequisite to successfully make changes on product and platform features by quickly understanding requirements.
Take advantage of learning opportunities whenever possible. This includes when other team members experience design and troubleshooting issues.
Proactively ask for assistance while utilizing all available resources.
Ability to work effectively on multiple priorities with strict deliverable dates. Be involved in all stages of development, from product ideation through architecture and execution.
Support the evolution of the Oracle development methodology including development and documentation standards, testing procedures, quality assurance and change management.
Continual focus on maintaining up-to-date knowledge of technology standards, industry trends, emerging technologies, and software development best practices.
Ensure technical and production issues are quickly resolved and suggest strategies and solutions to help reduce the likelihood of reoccurrence.
Participate and support the Oracle (HCM and ERP) strategy to stakeholders to achieve cross-organizational alignment.
Proactively communicate to management the progress and issues that encompass the assigned IT department.
Provide all stakeholders with high-level of service excellence.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand the application integrations and suggest an architectural solution that fits the needs for all scenarios.
Exhibits time management and organization skills, works with minimum supervision; makes independent decisions, and is detailed and thorough in work habits with the ability to multi-task.
Trustworthy, maintains confidentiality, and follows company policies and procedures.

SKILLS & CERTIFICATIONS

Minimum of Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Business Administration or related field required.
Experience in at least Oracle R13 or newer required.
Experience with Microsoft Office Applications needed to perform daily duties, e.g., Word, Excel, Visio, etc.
Experience with all phases of the Software Development Lifecycle, including system analysis, design, coding, testing, debugging and documentation.
Self-motivated, solid interpersonal skills and a good communicator.
Detailed oriented, committed to excellence and takes unrelenting pride in the code you write
Strong problem solving skills, willingness to take ownership and risks, and enthusiasm in the face of technical challenges.
Proven ability to work and succeed in a team-oriented environment.
Proven ability to work creatively and analytically in a problem-solving environment.
Good communication (written and oral) and interpersonal skills
Preferred 2 years of experience implementing and configuring packaged Oracle modules in Fusion and / or EBS, with 1 year experience specifically configuring Oracle Fusion.
Ability to create and escalate SRs with Oracle to help resolve ongoing support issues.
Vendor relationship management experience a plus.
Ability to create BI Publisher reports, OTBI reports, FRS reports, Smart View, HCM Extracts, Fast Formula and Dashboards. Good to have experience in at least one skill.
skills: ['Oracle Financials', 'Oracle HCM', 'Techno-Functional']

job_desc:
About the job
What will your essential responsibilities include?

Work with Lead Engineer, Global Technology and developer community in order to create and continuously improve semi- and fully automated journeys for testing and deployment of data, machine learning and actuarial applications written in Python and R.
Create and own virtual infrastructure provisioning scripts based on Terraform.
Create and own monitoring solutions for applications that are already deployed, tracking both technical and analytical KPIs.
Help actuarial and data science developer community with engineering ways of working such as automation, testing, logging, CI/CD, observability, release lifecycle.

We’re looking for someone who has these abilities and skills:
Previous experience of DevOps, ideally with large / complex data applications.
Required experience – most of below:
Infrastructure as Code: Ansible, Puppet or Terraform (preferred)
CI/CD: Jenkins, Gitlab, Azure DevOps, Harness (preferred)
Source version control: GitHub or Bitbucket
Containers: Docker, Kubernetes / OpenShift
Logging and monitoring tools
Azure or other cloud integration and administration experience.
Desired experience – some of below:
Previous work on data science workflow automation, e.g. through MLFlow
Understanding of popular data science frameworks: e.g. scikit-learn, Pytorch
R scripting experience.
Understanding key principles and pitfalls of ML
Python programming, e.g. for test automation in Pytest

Flexible Work Eligible

Flexible Work Schedule

AXA XL is an Equal Opportunity Employer.

Location

IN-HR-Silokhera Gurgaon

Job Field

Operations

Schedule

Full-time

Job Type

Standard

job_desc:
About the job
Primary skills: Devops->Azure,Devops->AWS

A day in the life of an Infoscion

As part of the Infosys Delivery team, you will work on implementing designs, developing high quality programs and systems, partnering with our clients to ensure high quality deliverables.
You will create technical artifacts and be the first point of contact in responding to production issues and conducting any technical analysis to arrive at solutions
You will share your learnings from projects through knowledge management initiatives and leverage knowledge from other projects to drive high efficiency and effectiveness
You will be a key contributor to building efficient programs/systems. If you think you fit right in to help our clients navigate their next in their digital transformation journey, this is the place for you!
Advanced conceptual understanding of at least one Programming Language
Advanced conceptual understanding of one database and one Operating System
Understanding of Software Engineering with practice in at least one project
Ability to contribute in medium to complex tasks independently
Exposure to Design Principles and ability to understand Design Specifications independently
Ability to run Test Cases and scenarios as per the plan
Ability to accept and respond to production issues and coordinate with stake holders
Good understanding of SDLC
Analytical abilities
Logical thinking
Awareness of latest technologies and trends

job_desc:
About the job
Test Manager




Qualification




Graduate (Bachelorâ€™s Degree in Computer Science or in â€œSTEMâ€ Majors (Science, Technology, Engineering and Math) or related field)




Responsibility




Test Requirement Analysis:




â€¢ Create/modify/review Master Test Strategy docuement for large engagements.
â€¢ Create/update/review Test Estimations Project/ Sprint Planning effort.
â€¢ Leverage previous project experience/learning like Retrospection Report Lesson Learnt for better requirement analysis.
â€¢ Review architecture & design work products by adopting White Box testing techniques to identify defects by leveraging predefined checklist and cognizant solution accelerators(if any).




Test Strategy And Test Planning




* Create test strategy (that includes release date types of testing scope of the project detail explanation of particular release RAID Risk Assumptions Issues and Dependencies etc).
* Gather inputs from the client (eg Types of testing Development teams Client managers etc).
* Prepare test plan covering timelines resource (Man /Machine) deployment ( How it will be tested ).
* Seek sign off on the test plan.
â€¢ Involve Project/ Sprint Planning to define the sprint goals scrum review meetings identify the product backlogs & provide risks/issues to scrum team for quicker remediation.
â€¢ Review & seek signoff from customer on Retrospection Report Lesson Learnt for every release.




Test Design Techniques (Design Principles/tools/patterns)




â€¢ Review the test scenarios and seek review as required.
Track the root cause of the review comments and take actions to resolve them.
â€¢ Review the test cases and traceability matrix to ensure total coverage of requirements.
â€¢ Track the downtime and report the same to the client.
â€¢ Support the team/ client in conducting UAT/BUT if applicable.
â€¢ Perform sanity testing to ensure system readiness for testing.
Upload the test cases.
â€¢ Validate readiness of the test environment for test execution.
Prepare test lab for test execution.
â€¢ Seek sign off from the client at various stages of the cycle as required.




Only For Onsite Coordinator




â€¢ Support Business Lead at client side to perform UAT.
If requested identify the test data for UAT.
â€¢ Create Run Plan document that captures priority of test cases based on complexity.




Coding Practices & Defect Management




â€¢ Posses holistic view of quality Domain User experience Black box White box testing.
â€¢ Able to estimate and commit task level effort and deliver activities on time.
â€¢ Review the defects logged by team and assign it to the right owner.
â€¢ Effective technical communication by participating in architectural/design reviews.
â€¢ Speak the developer language.
â€¢ Support Quality Assurance goals.
â€¢ Adhere to all customer standards policies and governance practices.
â€¢ Comprehensive understanding of full development lifecycle and is actively involved in all phases.
* Involvement with development teams architects early in the project life cycle to identify the dependencies on architecture design low level design components & coding standards test data dependencies environment dependencies etc.




Test Execution (Automation/Specialized Testing)




â€¢ Design & implement best in class automation framework based on AUT.
â€¢ Review the test results and clarify doubts/query raised by team during execution.
â€¢ Prepare Test summary Report and share the same for review/ Review the test results/test reports submitted by the test analyst.
â€¢ Capture lessons learnt and the best practices adopted.
â€¢ Periodically generate metrics based on the audience.
â€¢ Review metrics to identify areas for process optimization.
â€¢ Create robust test automation scripts.
â€¢ Web Services Design the Web Services testing framework.
â€¢ DevOps Define deploy & monitoring metrics configuration.
â€¢ Has expert knowledge of multi threading & other QE tools & technology.
* Discussion with the development release & deployment team stakeholders to make go no go decision based on test results and test closure summary report.
* Possess specialist knowlege on Continous integration/deployment & delivery using industry best tools & technologies.
* Perform Frequent monitoring & Failure analysis will be done.
* Perform Script fixing for any errors/issues.
* Status is shared to onsite across all teams.
* Frequent Optimization /Maintenance.




Technology Consulting Research & Analysis




â€¢ Participate in quality design decisions for automations stability usability & scalability of application under test.
â€¢ Code quality coverage & productivity analysis to ensure all areas of program are exercised by test suites.




People Management




* Organize the boot camp for new entrants.
â€¢ Develop and sustain positive relationships with peers.
* Identify training needs of team members.
* Identify groom reward and develop high performers.
* Resolve escalated conflicts and grievances.




Knowledge & Innovation Management




* Mentor/coach the team to create knowledge artefacts (eg collaterals reusable assets) to drive knowledge management.
* Improvise already existing processes based on the experience.
* Institutionalize systems and processes in place to implement innovation suggestion made by the team (eg adoption of Cognizant proprietary best practices / tools process optimization like usage of tools automation etc ).
* Identify the time and cost savings made due to adoption of the best practices.
* Create condusive environment for team members to innovate & share ideas.




Project Configuration & Release Management




â€¢ Review the daily deliverables and share it with the stakeholders appropriately.
â€¢ Create and share weekly status reports and daily status reports with the team/ relevant stakeholders.
â€¢ Facilitate calls between onsite and offshore teams to discuss the project status.
â€¢ Identify resources based on the estimation and required skill set.
(Only For Maintenance/Enhancements Project).
â€¢ Create estimation for enhancements based on the understanding of requirement.
â€¢ Perform POCs on the tools (eg accelerators performance enhancers ) if required.
â€¢ Coordinate with the release manager to keep abreast with the various activities in the test environment (eg build schedule) and to ensure the right components move to the production.




Must Have Skills




Selenium




Employee Status : Full Time Employee




Shift : Day Job




Travel : No




Job Posting : Apr 10 2021




About Cognizant




Cognizant (Nasdaq-100: CTSH) is one of the world's leading professional services companies, transforming clients' business, operating and technology models for the digital era. Our unique industry-based, consultative approach helps clients envision, build and run more innovative and efficient businesses. Headquartered in the U.S., Cognizant is ranked 185 on the Fortune 500 and is consistently listed among the most admired companies in the world. Learn how Cognizant helps clients lead with digital at www.cognizant.com or follow us @Cognizant. 00041782571

job_desc:
About the job

Summary

People at Apple don’t just build products — they craft the kind of experience that has revolutionised entire industries. The diverse collection of our people and their ideas encourage innovation in everything we do. Imagine what you could do here! Join Apple, and help us leave the world better than we found it. At Apple, new ideas have a way of becoming extraordinary products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Every single day, people do amazing things at Apple.


Contact Technologies uses advanced logic and custom applications to allow any Apple customer via voice, chat or email to connect with Apple through a personalized, high-touch experience. As a DevOps Project Manager, you will lead the process of improving and maintaining the stability and reliability of the production environment applying standard processes of DevOps and Operational Excellence across multiple applications in the Contact Center.


Key Qualifications

Deep knowledge of DevOps principles and standard methodologies


Good knowledge of security standard processes


Experience in large enterprise & global engineering, development and support


Experience in Machine Learning and predictive analytics


Experience in Contact Center application design/development


Excellent verbal and documentation skills (Able to communicate with more non-technical business users)


Good analytical skills and ability to research and present findings


Great teammate with excellent collaboration skills


Pro-active and able to work independently


Attention to detail


Description

In this role, we are looking for expertise in DevOps and Project Management to ensure that changes to production do not cause incidents that impact our business. You will be responsible for the work of the Operations Team, ensuring that objectives are met. Use your understanding of security practices to develop standards across the organization to ensure our properties are safe from attackers and use data and analysis of log files to resolve areas to improve. Define objectives and key results and use metrics to measure the impact. You will work with and influence multiple teams, including development, production support, business teams, and other technical and non-technical teams within Apple. Your goal is to ensure an efficient, reliable process from development to production to allow our business teams to continue to provide the greatest customer experience.


Education & Experience

Bachelor’s degree or equivalent work experience


Role Number: 200375423
skills: ['Analytical Skills', 'Communication', 'Teamwork', 'Analytics', 'Attention to Detail', 'Contact Centers', 'Data Analytics', 'Documentation', 'Global Engineering', 'Predictive Analytics']

job_title: Lead Test Engineer - Automation Test Engineer
job_desc:
About the job
At EY, you’ll have the chance to build a career as unique as you are, with the global scale, support, inclusive culture and technology to become the best version of you. And we’re counting on your unique voice and perspective to help EY become even better, too. Join us and build an exceptional experience for yourself, and a better working world for all.




Test Engineer




Rank: Supervising Associate




Fueled by strategic investment in technology and innovation, Client Technology seeks to drive growth opportunities and solve complex business problems for our clients through building a robust platform for business and powerful product engine that are integral to innovation at scale. You will work with technologists and business specialists, blending EY’s deep industry knowledge and innovative ideas with our platforms, capabilities, and technical expertise. As a champion for change and growth, you will be at the forefront of integrating emerging technologies from AI to Data Analytics into every corner of what we do at EY. That means more growth for you, exciting learning opportunities, career choices, and the chance to make a real impact.




The opportunity




The selected candidate will:




Engage with multi-functional and multi-regional teams to create impactful products and services using ground-breaking technology and tools. This also comes with the prospect to flourish in an organization that nourishes innovation, fosters creativity and encourages ideas for the future.




Your Key Responsibilities




Lead the test activities to ensure product quality, setting project timelines and supervising the activities of other testers
Design, develop, and support test cases for functional and non-functional domains and resolve issues that may impede the test effort
Drive the identification of the test scope and test environment set-up, prepare test plans, identify relevant metrics and keep track of required effort
Manage the execution of tests, review reports and interpret recommendations for product or design changes
Define and review internal quality control standards and the maintenance of reliability programs
Develop relationships with other engineering groups to evaluate, recommend and implement testing procedures for products, systems, components or modifications




Skills And Attributes For Success




Broad understanding of testing lifecycle and agile frameworks
Specialized knowledge of Quality Management techniques




To qualify for the role you must have




Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, IT, or related field and 8-12 years of relevant work experience
Proficiency in testing concepts/standards & Agile methodology
Good understanding on Automation Testing concepts. The candidate should be able to implement automation/performance strategy, and guide automation/performance testing team.
Hands-on experience authoring, building and adopting large-scale, automation frameworks with well-balanced coverage across UI, functional, API and back-end integration (including end-to-end automation) and experience with different test automation approaches (including BDD and hybrid)
Experience in Selenium with Java / Python - Knowledge at scripting/coding level
Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills
Experience and knowledge of Azure DevOps or any relevant defect management tool and CI/CD.
Self –starter, with the flexibility to adjust to multiple demands, shifting priorities, ambiguity and rapid change
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Ability to understand and integrate with cultural differences and engage with virtual cross-cultural, cross-border teams
Experience in supporting small to medium size projects and the relevant Performance indicators and metrics




Ideally, you’ll also have




Lean certification or Six Sigma Green/Black Belt.




What We Look For




A self-starter, independent-thinker, curious and creative person with ambition and passion




What We Offer




As part of this role, you'll work in a highly integrated, globally diverse team with the opportunity and tools to grow, develop and drive your career forward. Here, you can combine global opportunity with flexible working. The EY benefits package goes above and beyond too, focusing on your physical, emotional, financial and social well-being. Your recruiter can talk to you about the benefits available in your country. Here’s a snapshot of what we offer:




Continuous learning: You will develop the mindset and skills to navigate whatever comes next.
Success as defined by you: We will provide the tools and flexibility, so you can make a significant impact, your way.
Transformative leadership: We will give you the insights, coaching and confidence to be the leader the world needs.
Diverse and inclusive culture: You will be accepted for who you are and empowered to use your voice to help others find theirs.




EY | Building a better working world




EY exists to build a better working world, helping to create long-term value for clients, people and society and build trust in the capital markets.




Enabled by data and technology, diverse EY teams in over 150 countries provide trust through assurance and help clients grow, transform and operate.




Working across assurance, consulting, law, strategy, tax and transactions, EY teams ask better questions to find new answers for the complex issues facing our world today.

job_desc:
About the job
At EY, you’ll have the chance to build a career as unique as you are, with the global scale, support, inclusive culture and technology to become the best version of you. And we’re counting on your unique voice and perspective to help EY become even better, too. Join us and build an exceptional experience for yourself, and a better working world for all.




Full Stack (HANA, CAPM, UI5) Developer




Title: Full Stack Developer




Rank: Sup Associate




EY is a global leader in assurance, tax, transaction and advisory services. Technology is at the heart of what we do and deliver at EY. Technology solutions are integrated in the client services we deliver and are key to our innovation as an organization.




Fueled by strategic investment in technology and innovation, Client Technology seeks to drive growth opportunities and solve complex business problems for our clients through building a robust platform for business and powerful product engine that are vital to innovation at scale. As part of Client Technology, you’ll work with technologists and business experts, blending EY’s deep industry knowledge and innovative ideas with our platforms, capabilities, and technical expertise. As a catalyst for change and growth, you’ll be at the forefront of integrating emerging technologies from AI to Data Analytics into every corner of what we do at EY. That means more growth for you, exciting learning opportunities, career choices, and the chance to make a real impact.




The opportunity




The selected candidate will:




Supports the day-to-day activities of the development and engineering team by coding, programming and capturing specifications for a defined project, using developing technical capabilities
Assists in the development and maintenance of a relevant solution or infrastructure, ensuring compliance with the relevant standards
Translates product requirements into technical requirements and system language
Contribute to the aligned and consistent design and/or architecture of a product, part of a product or a specific architecture subject
Identify improvements and innovations in development processes and methodologies.




Your Key Responsibilities




Assume responsibility for designing, developing, implementing and testing complete end-to-end business processes with a strong focus on quality
End-to-end understanding of development processes.
Work on POC’s to take appropriate design decisions.
Guide team development efforts towards successful product delivery.
Identify and encourage areas for growth and improvement within the team.
Collaborate with other software developers, business analysts and software architects to plan, design, develop, test, and maintain applications built on SAP technologies.
Assist in the collection and documentation of user's requirements, development of user stories, estimates and work plans.




Skills And Attributes For Success




Strong programming background with good technical skills
Ability to transfer business requirement into a realizable technical requirement.
Knowledge in the following areas is beneficial: SAP BTP, Cloud Foundry.
Good understanding of Nodejs, docker, GIT, Gerrit.
Good communication skills




To qualify for the role, you must have




Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, IT, Mathematics, or related field preferred
B.Tech / M.Tech / MCA with an aggregate score of 70% or above from IIT/NIT/any tier 1 Institute preferred
At least five years of relevant professional experience in IT architecture
Strong programming background of/Experience in UI technologies: UI5, Fiori, HTML5,JavaScript, TypeScript, NodeJS, CSS3
Experience in cloud-based development using BTP, Cloud Foundry, Docker, AWS or Azure
Understanding of OData, CDS views, any Database preferably HANA
Exposure to UX designing is a plus
Automated System Tests for CAP-Based Projects to CI/CD Pipeline
Good to have experience in consuming Remote Services from SAP S/4HANA Cloud and Add the Consumption of an External Service Using CAP
Sound and practical knowledge of SAP technology and SAP architecture, S/4HANA, Fiori
An experience in SAP CDS and SQL is a must.
Experience creating and configuring launchpad sites using BTP portal service / Launchpad Service/ work Zone Service
GIT HUB, GIT , DevOps, Nodejs, & Microservice Architecture.
Excellent level of expertise and hands-on experience with the SAP Business Technology Platform, regarding both the Extension Suite and Integration Suite
Understanding of the SAP Cloud Application Programming Model (CAP)
Capability and experience in driving BTP-related topics (developments, guidelines, etc.) in a DevOps and/or agile environment
Very good knowledge of SAP Product Standards and make sure that the architectural design adheres to it.
Ensure excellent quality and maintain high standards in all processes listed in the relevant process map
Capable of conducting Code Reviews, Code Inspections and other quality relevant exercises
Knowledge of Cloud Development and Maintenance Processes
Experience in independently handling of projects
Knowledge in Release management or Software Production processes
Good to have: Beneficial: Interest in programming models, frameworks, SDKs, Cloud application development.
Expertise in these areas: SAPUI5 and FIORI APPS extension/configurations, Web IDE / Eclipse tool to develop Fiori applications, JavaScript/ jQuery to write functions, good knowledge on MVC framework




Ideally, you’ll also have




Strong analytical capabilities and logical skills, Solution designing experience is a must.
Provide technical leadership to teammates through coaching and mentorship. Maintain high standards of software quality within the team by establishing good practices and habits.
Good understanding of agile methodology and scrum processes.
Very good communication skills, service and solution-oriented work attitude as well as high analytical capabilities
You’re eager to learn: you can quickly adapt new technologies and derive meaningful evaluations for the company. Once you learn something new, you are excited to evaluate it and teach it to others.
Fluency in English;




What We Look For




A self-starter, independent-thinker, curious and creative person with ambition and passion




What Working At EY Offers




We offer a competitive remuneration package where you’ll be rewarded for your individual and team performance. Our comprehensive Total Rewards package includes support for flexible working and career development, and with FlexEY you can select benefits that suit your needs, covering holidays, health and well-being, insurance, savings and a wide range of discounts, offers and promotions. Plus, we offer:




Support, coaching and feedback from some of the most engaging colleagues around
Opportunities to develop new skills and progress your career
The freedom and flexibility to handle your role in a way that’s right for you




EY is committed to being an inclusive employer and we are happy to consider flexible working arrangements. We strive to achieve the right balance for our people, enabling us to deliver excellent client service whilst allowing you to build your career without sacrificing your personal priorities. While our client-facing professionals can be required to travel regularly, and at times be based at client sites, our flexible working arrangements can help you to achieve a lifestyle balance.




About EY




As a global leader in assurance, tax, transaction and advisory services, we’re using the finance products, expertise and systems we’ve developed to build a better working world. That starts with a culture that believes in giving you the training, opportunities and creative freedom to make things better. Whenever you join, however long you stay, the exceptional EY experience lasts a lifetime.




If you can confidently demonstrate that you meet the criteria above, please contact us as soon as possible.




Make your mark.




Apply now.




EY | Building a better working world




EY exists to build a better working world, helping to create long-term value for clients, people and society and build trust in the capital markets.




Enabled by data and technology, diverse EY teams in over 150 countries provide trust through assurance and help clients grow, transform and operate.




Working across assurance, consulting, law, strategy, tax and transactions, EY teams ask better questions to find new answers for the complex issues facing our world today.

job_desc:
About the job

Role: Oracle Clouds Project

Location: Mumbai, Hyderabad

Experience: 3- 7 Years







Job Description :

Must have minimum 2 yrs. implementation experience in Oracle PPM cloud

Must have good understanding of PPM batch process, PPM Reports (OTBI , analytics), PPM Integrations with offerings (ERP Cloud, SCM Cloud)

Must have minimum 10+ prior year experience in Oracle EBS with 2-3+ yrs. of functional experience in Project Accounting modules

Good functional knowledge and hands-on experience on Oracle PPM cloud offerings such as Project Costing, Project Contracts, Project Billing and Project Control

Must have good understanding of Cloud tools such as FSM, rapid implementation templates and ADFdi, etc.

Must have experience in business process mapping, fit/gap Analysis, Level 1 – 3 finance business process

Certification in PPM offerings will be preferred

Must have experience in functional specifications , OTBI reports and analytics, configuration of Oracle templates in BI Publisher

Must have good understand of Oracle PPM cloud integration points, Data loaders, Spreadsheet data loader, etc.

Experience in PPM cloud security and workflows

Experience in providing end users training

Excellent communication skills, to be able to discuss technical & functional issues/solutions, in highly escalated situations, with executives, support & customer personnel;

Experience in communicating and collaborating across all levels of an organization

Self driven, motivated, Pro-active, well organized and a thorough planner

Highly skilled at problem-solving & highly developed analytical skills
